verses.text: Praise ye Jehovah's name, Praise through his courts resound; Aloud the mighty acts proclaim, His glo - ry tell around.
Praise him in sounds that tell His ex - cel - lence abroad; Praise him in harps that gently swell His grace thro' ages broad.
Let all his saints advance, His praise with voices raise; While instruments of every kind Their var - ied notes em - ploy.
While his rich grace we prove, Visit us his love, Call with his name; And with his grace, End with his name.
